extends Object

    • Method Detail

      • getPid

        public int getPid​()
        Obtains the process ID (PID) from the application fault record.
        Returns:
        Returns the PID of the faulty application.
        Since:
        5

      • getUid

        public int getUid​()
        Obtains the user ID (UID) from the application fault record.
        Returns:
        Returns the UID of the faulty application.
        Since:
        5

      • getFaultType

        public int getFaultType​()
        Obtains the fault type from the application fault record.
        Returns:
        Returns the fault type, which can be FaultLogger#FAULT_TYPE_JAVA_CRASH, FaultLogger#FAULT_TYPE_CPP_CRASH, FaultLogger#FAULT_TYPE_JS_CRASH, or FaultLogger#FAULT_TYPE_APP_FREEZE.
        Since:
        5

      • getTimestamp

        public long getTimestamp​()
        Obtains the time when the application fault record was generated.
        Returns:
        Returns the time of record generation.
        Since:
        5

      • getReason

        public String getReason​()
        Obtains the reason why the application fault record was generated.
        Returns:
        Returns the reason for record generation.
        Since:
        5

      • getSummary

        public String getSummary​()
        Obtains the summary of the application fault record.

        A record summary briefs the fault characteristics. For example, the summary of a FaultLogger#FAULT_TYPE_JAVA_CRASH fault describes the call stack of the crashed thread.

        Returns:
        Returns the record summary.
        Since:
        5

      • getLogFileStream

        public Optional<FileInputStream> getLogFileStream​()
        Obtains the log file stream of the application fault record.

        Generally, log files record detailed information for fault locating.

        Returns:
        Returns the log file stream if obtained; returns null if there are no log files.
        Since:
        5
